Allrighty, guys, forget about me changing email. Its too much effort 
and I'm too lazy. I'll still be using this one.

And Kinger, that'll be enough DBZ. After the Kamahahmahah, I don't 
think gravity training or anything belong in a BW RPG. Please train 
normally.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., kinger01030@c... wrote:
>  Galvatron DID FLIPPS AROUND THE ROOM. hE WAS DAMAGES PRETTY BADLY 
BUT HE 
> KEPT GOING. hE COULD ALMOST MOVE AS IF IN REGULAR GRAVITY NOW. hE 
DIDGED THE 
> SHOTS WITH EASE AND BEAGAN SHOOTING SMALL BURTS OF ENERGY FROM EACH 
HAND AT 
> THE TENTACLES.
